description: A simple CLI todo app in Node.js that stores todos in a local JSON file

userStories.title: Initialize Node.js project with package.json
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a basic Node.js project setup so I can start building the CLI app.
acceptanceCriteria: package.json exists with name 'todo-cli' and type 'module'
userStories.notes: Implemented all commands in index.js upfront for simplicity.

userStories.title: Add a todo
userStories.description: As a user, I want to add a todo item from the command line so I can track tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: Running 'node src/index.js add "Buy milk"' creates a todo
Todos are saved to a todos.json file
Each todo has an id, text, and done (false) field

userStories.title: List all todos
userStories.description: As a user, I want to list all my todos so I can see what I need to do.
acceptanceCriteria: Running 'node src/index.js list' prints all todos
Shows todo id, text, and status (done or not)
Shows a message if no todos exist

userStories.title: Mark a todo as done
userStories.description: As a user, I want to mark a todo as complete so I can track my progress.
acceptanceCriteria: Running 'node src/index.js done <id>' marks that todo as done
Shows error if id does not exist

userStories.title: Delete a todo
userStories.description: As a user, I want to remove a todo I no longer need.
acceptanceCriteria: Running 'node src/index.js delete <id>' removes that todo
Shows error if id does not exist
